alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 3:15AM PST until March 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 6500 feet, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 14 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Heaviest snow will be over the northern portions of each zone, with much lighter snow expected in southern valley areas such as Tonopah. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy conditions Saturday could lead to areas of blowing/drifting snow, which could reduce visibility and further worsen travel conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
